casebody.data:
Pault FACEY, petitioner,
v.
NEW YORK CITY DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION. No. 13-1358. Supreme Court of the United States June 30, 2014.

Case below, 105 A.D.3d 547, 963 N.Y.S.2d 207.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Appellate Division, Supreme Court of New York, First Judicial Department, denied.
